it.uniba.controller

Class DataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.controller.DataController

  • public class DataController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class (following the design pattern MVC (MVP)) is used to manage the calls of the View and the Model. It's the logical part of the project.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataController(Model modIn, View viewIn)
      DataController's constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void printAllMention(java.lang.String inChannel, boolean weight)
      Prints all the mention of a specified channel, if inChannel is null the function prints all the mention of the workspace, with the boolean weight the function can show the numbers of mention.
      void printChannelMembers(java.lang.String nameChannel)
      Prints all the members of a specified channel using the model for the data and the view for the output.
      void printChannels()
      Prints the channels' list using the model for the data and the view for the output.
      void printMembers()
      Prints the members' list using the model for the data and the view for the output.
      void printMembers4Channel()
      Prints all the channels and the respective members using the model for the data and the view for the output.
      void printMentionsFromUser(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String inChannel)
      Prints all mention from a specified user in a specified channel.
      void printMentionsFromUserWeigthed(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String inChannel)
      Prints all mention from a specified user in a specified channel with the number of mention (weight).
      void printMentionsToUser(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String inChannel)
      Prints all mention to a specified user in a specified channel.
      void printMentionsToUserWeigthed(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String inChannel)
      Prints all mention to a specified user in a specified channel with the number of mention(weight).
      void showHelp()
      Prints the help's message.
      void updateModel(java.lang.String path)
      Updates the Model using the path of the zip file of the workspace.

        Throws:
        java.util.zip.ZipException - if file does not exists
        java.io.IOException - for errors at OS level

      • printAllMention

        public void printAllMention(java.lang.String inChannel,
                            boolean weight)
                     throws ExceptionsHandler
        Prints all the mention of a specified channel, if inChannel is null the function prints all the mention of the workspace, with the boolean weight the function can show the numbers of mention.
        Parameters:
        inChannel - String name of the channel specified
        weight - boolean indicate if to show the weight
        Throws:
        ExceptionsHandler - used to handle exceptions
